item.description:
Come an join us for an Authentic Austrian cuisine experience.

This is a special place where the owner is from Austria and is also the cook. Markus Patsch did his culinary training in Innsbruck, Austria. He first arrived in this country as the preferred chef of the late great pianist Victor Borge, and he quickly established himself as a sought after chef of tasty and interesting cuisine.


Directions:

Located just 25 minutes north of New Haven, 20 minutes east of Waterbury, 15 minutes west of Meriden & Wallingford, The Watch Factory Restaurant offers a unique food experience in a cosy community of lovers of Austrian food, beer, & wine.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Meetup sign or ask for Terri Bruno's table

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!
